Class ChannelMessageActionEvent

java.lang.Object
com.github.philippheuer.events4j.core.domain.Event

com.github.twitch4j.chat.events.channel.ChannelMessageActionEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.github.philippheuer.events4j.api.domain.IEvent, ReplyableEvent
public class ChannelMessageActionEvent extends AbstractChannelMessageEvent
This event gets called when an action message (/me text) is received in a channel.

    • ChannelMessageActionEvent

      public ChannelMessageActionEvent(EventChannel channel, IRCMessageEvent messageEvent, EventUser user, String message, Set<CommandPermission> permissions)
      Event Constructor
      Parameters:
      channel - The channel that this event originates from.
      messageEvent - The raw message event
      user - The user who triggered the event.
      message - The plain text of the message.
      permissions - The permissions of the triggering user.
